New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns recorded his third 30-10 game with 31 points, 21 rebounds, and four assists.
Josh Hart achieved a triple-double with 15 points, 14 rebounds, and 12 assists.
Key Match Events: The Knicks started an 8-0 run in the fourth quarter, capped by Josh Hart's split from the line.
New York's lead reached 20 points late in the game after a three-pointer by Mikal Bridges.
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks played without Jalen Brunson and Deuce McBride.
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks improved to 24-10 in the season with the win.
The Jazz dropped to 7-25 and lost their fifth straight game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Madison Square Garden.The Knicks' next game is against the Oklahoma City Thunder, who have a 12-game winning streak.
Others: Other NBA games mentioned include Raptors snapping an 11-game losing streak, Miami Heat's win, Detroit Pistons' victory, and Washington Wizards' win.
